restaurants_bars.name: Shula's Steak House
restaurants_bars.description: A upscale steakhouse named after Dolphins' famous coach Don Shula, located just 5 miles from the stadium.

restaurants_bars.name: Bokampers
restaurants_bars.description: Sports bar owned by former Miami Dolphins player, located less than 10 miles from the stadium. Offers an extensive game-day menu.

accommodations.name: Stadium Hotel
accommodations.description: The closest hotel to Hard Rock Stadium with a football field and sports bar on-site.

accommodations.name: Courtyard by Marriott Miami Aventura Mall
accommodations.description: Located under 10 miles from the stadium, offers shuttle service to the games.

tourist_attractions.name: Bayfront Park
tourist_attractions.description: Located in downtown Miami, often hosts pre-game festivities and live broadcasts of Dolphins games.

tourist_attractions.name: Miami Seaquarium
tourist_attractions.description: A marine-life entertainment park that's a fun stop for families. It's even home to a dolphin show!

options.description: Miami's rapid transit system. On game days, fans can take the Metrorail to the Earlington Heights station and transfer to the Metrobus Route 297 (Stadium Shuttle).
Hard Rock Stadium has a designated Rideshare Zone located in Lot 14 for convenient drop-off and pick-up.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Look for presale codes or special promotional offers through email newsletters, try to purchase tickets as soon as they go on sale to avoid price hikes, attend mid-week games which are often cheaper.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Avoid buying tickets from street vendors. Instead, opt for authorized ticket outlets and ensure you receive a receipt upon purchase.
